sentences.cn: 鲍勃迅速掏出他的笔记本。

sentences.en: Copy this page in your notebook.
sentences.cn: 把这一页抄到你的笔记本上.

sentences.en: He brought out a notebook and pen from his pocket.
sentences.cn: 他从口袋里掏出了一个笔记本和一支钢笔。

sentences.en: He drew out his notebook and began to take notes.
sentences.cn: 他掏出笔记本开始记笔记.

sentences.en: He noted down her address in his notebook.
sentences.cn: 他把她的地址草草地记在了笔记本上.

sentences.en: He returned the notebook to his jacket.
sentences.cn: 他把笔记本放回到他的夹克里。
他啪的一声合上了笔记本。

sentences.en: He took a small notebook from his jacket pocket and tore out a page.
sentences.cn: 他从上衣口袋里掏出小笔记本，撕下来一页。

sentences.en: He took my name and address, scribbling it down in his notebook.
sentences.cn: 他要了我的姓名和地址，匆匆写在他的笔记本上。

sentences.en: He took out his notebook and flipped the pages.
sentences.cn: 他掏出笔记本，飞快地翻着。

sentences.en: He transcribed two paragraphs from the book into his notebook.
sentences.cn: 他把书中的两段抄在笔记本上.

sentences.en: Prue entered the passage in her notebook, then read it aloud again.
sentences.cn: 普吕把那一段写在她的笔记本上，然后又大声念了一遍。

sentences.en: She forsook her notebook for new technology.
sentences.cn: 她丢开笔记本开始使用新技术。

sentences.en: She immediately copied the letter in her notebook.
sentences.cn: 她立即把这封信抄在她的笔记本里。

sentences.en: She rummaged in the desk drawers for her notebook.
sentences.cn: 她在书桌抽屉里翻找她的笔记本。

sentences.en: Tamsin materialized at her side, notebook at the ready.
sentences.cn: 塔姆辛从她身旁冒了出来，且备好了笔记本。

sentences.en: The boy punched holes in the paper so it would fit in his notebook.
sentences.cn: 那男孩在纸上打洞以便装在笔记本上.

sentences.en: What did you do with that notebook?
sentences.cn: 你把那个笔记本放哪儿了？

phrases.tran_cn: 笔记本电脑；笔记本型个人计算机

trans.tran_cn: 笔记簿，笔记本电脑，手册，笔记本
trans.tran_en: a book made of plain paper on which you can write notes
a book made of plain paper on which you can write notes
